task.title: Joining an instant meeting
task.shortdesc: Anyone with the meeting link can join an instant meeting. Since instant meetings are unmoderated, any authenticated user can start the meeting. If you're signed in, you can find your existing instant meetings on the Recent tab. To generate a report, refer to .

taskbody.prereq: You must secure the meeting link or name in order to join or access the meeting. The meeting link is in the following format.https://meetings.customname.com/meeting/[meeting name]

context.p: To join an instant meeting through the meeting link, follow these steps:

step.cmd: In a web browser, go to the meeting link.
step.info: Follow the instructions on how to configure and allow browser access to your audio output, microphone, and camera.

step.cmd: Select Login. Do one of the following:

ul.li: Sign in to your account. For more information, refer to .
Select Join as a guest. Enter your display name, and then select Join as a guest.

info.note: For security reasons, Sametime requires all users to sign in as a guest or authenticated user before joining.

task.title: Joining an instant meeting from the Meetings homepage

context.p: You can also join an instant meeting from the Meetings homepage. Simply follow these steps:

step.cmd: In a web browser, go to the Meetings homepage.
Select Login. Do one of the following:

ul.li: Sign in to your account. For more information, refer to .
Select Join as a guest. Enter your display name, and then select Join as a guest.

info.note: For security reasons, Sametime requires all users to sign in as a guest or authenticated user before joining.

step.cmd: From the Meetings homepage, select Get Started > Join an existing meeting.
Enter the meeting name. Contact the moderator for the meeting details.

step.info: Follow the instructions on how to configure and allow browser access to your audio output, microphone, and camera.
